item.title: A 90-Day Middle Credit Score Timeline for VA Buyers
item.description: Ask ten VA buyers what a “good” middle credit score is and you will hear ten nervous guesses. The truth is simpler: you need a score that supports the payment you want, the funding fee tier you prefer, and the concessions you expect to negotiate. The path there rarely requires heroic sacrificesâ€”just consistent behavior mapped over 90 days. Below is the timeline we use with service members who need a predictable plan.
